name: Death on Wheels
description:
Defend your base in the woods against hordes of zombies. Unlock cool cars with unique handling while you kill more and more zombies.

We wasnt able to test it on WebGL in term of performance. In term you have an Issue contact me on Discord ( StonedLover#0042) or join our Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/EVaEEa 

More Updates coming after the rating week!

Patch Notes:
Fixed the Discord Button for WebGL and also a bug which result in a stucked camera and wrong load data.
